website_summaries.verdict: When you need to enhance your collection of modeling tools, this set is a smart choice.
pros: Includes a pair of screwdrivers perfectly sized for assembling models
Kit ships with 12 spare knife blades, so you always have a sharp one available
All items fit inside a plastic case, so they're readily organized and prepped for use
cons: Majority of the tools are aimed at beginners

customer_reviews.title: Such a cool set to have.
customer_reviews.text: A great set to have for the beginning modeler. The nips are sharp and the hinge is still tight after 14 models. The tweezers are terrific! The sanding sticks are coarse, medium and ultra-fine; you probably won't need anything but the medium. The knife body is plastic, not metal, but it gets the job done and comes plenty extra tiny modeling blades. I even used the decal-applicator to flatten decals, you'd be amazed how well they turn out!
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Just get a pair of model spruercutters and a cuticle knife
customer_reviews.text: Most of the items are useless for gundam models The Emory boards are too course and just scuff up the model. The little files are way too rough to do any kind of work on the model. The tweezers aren't the right kind for holding or manipulating parts. All you really need are a pair of flush cut sprue clippers, a hobby knife, and a cuticle knife.
customer_reviews.author: Mitsurugi

customer_reviews.title: you will notice an immediate improvement if you buy a better pair. The sanding sticks are a bit large ...
customer_reviews.text: The nippers are really cheap, you will notice an immediate improvement if you buy a better pair. The sanding sticks are a bit large for Gunpla, but they'll work on the easy to access places. Overall a great starting point, this kit + a pack of Squadron Sanding Sticks got me through my first Master Grade without any hiccups. For people building High Grade kits or anything with equal or less parts than a HG, you can expect the nippers and sanding sticks to last for 2-3 builds, but don't expect the sticks to last you through an entire Master Grade, there's just too much sanding if you don't make really good use of the hobby knife.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great intro kit
customer_reviews.text: Overall: Its a decent starting kit for a cheap price. Product: It is a good collection of products to get anyone started with model kits. Keep in mind that you get what you pay for so don't expect top of the line products. At the same time these are not $1 junk items and are in fact significantly better quality. You could easily pay double if you just buy most of the items in this set individually so the price is definitely right. This set will get you started and if you continue the hobby you will be able to upgrade the pieces you feel are important to you. Happy modeling! :)
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: Great for Bandai Model Kits
customer_reviews.text: I received a couple of Bandai Star Wars model kits as a gift this holiday season, which this works perfectly for. I used some much larger side cutters at first (they were the only thing I had and were likely used to cut coax cable or something) and these are significantly easier to use to get the little nibs off the sides of each piece, and far more comfortable as well. I haven't found much use for the other stuff, but as I work through the model kit, I'm sure I'll have more use for it. I also really enjoy how everything comes in a plastic case.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan M.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad kit over all.
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad kit overall. Cutters are good along with files, and sanding sticks. Tweezers are good, but be careful of the sharp tips. Case should last a little while as long as you are not rough with it. Blades are a let down. Not very sharp at all. My worn out pocket knife is better in most all cases than that blade. Overall for the price it's not a bad kit. Good for a beginner too.
customer_reviews.author: David W. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Gunpla/Gundam builds
customer_reviews.text: The kit pictured is exactly what I got,I'm more than pleased with this tool kit since I recently just got into Gunpla collecting/building I need shears more than anything but everything that came in this kit are more than helpful. The Xacto is perfect for cutting the nubs down left behind from the sprues and the filers for sanding the nubs down. The Xacto knife comes with extras in their own bottle that way you can't lose track of them. I highly recommend this kit to anyone that builds Gunpla or any other models.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Queen

customer_reviews.title: Good value, but you'll need better nippers
customer_reviews.text: These nippers (really pliers) are rough on the plastic. You'll want to upgrade to a sharper, smaller set of nippers if you find that you enjoy model making. The whole set did the trick well-enough on my first high grade Gunpla and I still use the blade and sanding sticks.
customer_reviews.author: MMT

customer_reviews.title: These tools are great!
customer_reviews.text: I gave this a 5 star because the tools are really good and have helped me with my model kits. The tools look to be made fairly well. I haven't had an issue. They all come in pretty handy. I would definitely recommend this to people who are getting into modeling and don't want to spend much on a kit.
customer_reviews.author: PhotoJoe

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This set was perfect. Everything came as is. Tools were strong enough. Didnt break like some of the other reviews, everything was still in the package. Built my first Gundam using only the clippers for getting the pieces of the plastic holder and the prongs for sticker placement. Would recommend buying before starting on a model set. You could probably go to a hobby shop and get just the clippers for a lot cheaper, but this set allows you to expand if you are taking on more difficult builds.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Huh...not bad..
customer_reviews.text: The package came on time, everything is listed in the description. Nice that the pliers are oiled up and ready to go. Would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Marbas Helsing

customer_reviews.title: Decent kit if you dont already have the basics
customer_reviews.text: Decent little kit. I bought with my first gundam. Snippers, little screw drivers, tweezers are pretty good. Most of the files are just to rough for models unless you are leaveing huge nubs when cutting out. I have pretty much only used the finest sanding stick that has come with the kit to smooth out nubs.
customer_reviews.author: homer farks

customer_reviews.title: Mostly everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Has most things you would want. Pretty good quality as well. Only thing that could be added to it, wire cutters/wire strippers for a complete basic kit
customer_reviews.author: Jared D. Barlow

customer_reviews.title: Really good beginner modeling kit
customer_reviews.text: Even just on my first kit I used a lot of the tools. The clippers are obviously the most used, but I also used the tweezers for smaller bits as well as stickers, the files for getting rid of nubs and the pen knife for removing the pollycaps. For the price you absolutely can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Zer0Hour17

customer_reviews.title: Cheap price for quality, versitile tools
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as I was just getting into gunpla. The tools in this kit are very high quality, and can be used for much more than just model building. I do lots of arts and crafts so these tools come in handy all the time when I'm doing any smaller scale projects. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Zachary Pierce

customer_reviews.title: Super great kit!
customer_reviews.text: The really like the nibbers. They feel like they cut through almost unresisted. The 3 Emery boards do a great job as well. The hobby knife is good to. It came with a good amount of blades but I had change the first one out because it got rusty after sitting under the cap for a few weeks. The blade still cuts but I did it for safety. The tweezers have very fine tips, they are very sharp but bend easy. I haven't used the metal files yet but they feel very gritty. Over all great kit.
customer_reviews.author: Brant Guidry

customer_reviews.title: Comes in a great little travel-size box!! Perfect for beginngers
customer_reviews.text: This was a present for my boyfriend. He is happy with the quality of the product and the tools. It comes in a travel-size case, something I wasn't aware it would have but I was thrilled all the tools fit inside and it makes it easy to take around when building gundams. ALSO its great to keep things organized and in one place! I would definitely order the same package again!
customer_reviews.author: DC

customer_reviews.title: Convenient
customer_reviews.text: Cute and handy little kit. The yellow part separator has changed my life and I don't know how I lived without it. I like the handle for the xacto blades. The nippers are pretty sharp and the two tweezers are very nice. A good intro to gunpla for a newbie. The case is very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Keith R.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job....
customer_reviews.text: This kit had mostly everything I needed to get into building Gundam models. 4 models later, everything is still good, except the sanding sticks are starting to wear which is understandable. I thought the side cutters were good until I tried a pair of Tamiya 123's. I can't go back to using the cutters in this kit, it's fine for a beginner but once you try a higher end cutter, you realize you get what you pay for. Good kit to start with though, low cost, carrying case, and basically everything you need to assemble some Gundam!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Caccese

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need in a kit.
customer_reviews.text: Got all of the Model building tools I need in this kit. Great for starters or even intermediate. I had to build Gundams along with having to find each tool 1 by 1. This kit gives you everything you need to start.
customer_reviews.author: Dokkaso

customer_reviews.title: The Right Stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of gear for a great price. Very happy with purchase. Built a very intricate motorcycle model kit and these tools were everything I needed. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: Nexus_927

customer_reviews.title: Good enough to start building!
customer_reviews.text: A great starter kit. Has everything you really need to start building. The clippers were nice and sharp which made getting parts very easy. Do I have any complaints? No. It was cheap and it has high quality tools.
customer_reviews.author: stephy.hime

customer_reviews.title: Sharp and Precise!
customer_reviews.text: The tools worked incredibly when building my latest model. The cutters easily removed the smallest pieces, the tweezers helped get the smallest stickers I've ever seen into the most difficult positions, and the files and screw drivers were the perfect size for precise handling!
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.text: These were just what my spouse needed for his models. It's made everything easier on his hands, and the same amount of work that took him half the day to put together took half as long when he finally had the proper tools to use. Definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Tifa C.

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: This kit is not worth the price if you are interested in gunpla as a hobby. It is very low quality overall, and I would say ONLY the tweezers are of decent quality. My clippers came and smelled like Marijuana, the files are too rough/low quality, the non metal files were not even in the kit, and the hobby pin is very unsafe and low quality. Do yourself a favor and go purchase another kit - or better yet buy pieces separate. Customer support was very helpful with this issue, thanks guys :).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Scale modeler's set
customer_reviews.text: This kit looks like a cheap jumble of parts all thrown together, but I was decently surprised by the quality. I'm no professional model maker, but everything in here was useful to me.
customer_reviews.author: Chaotic

customer_reviews.title: Great, cheap, and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I've built a few kits using these tools, and I haven't needed anything else yet. You're going to want to sharpen the edges after enough clipping and cutting, but outside of that, this is a great value for your money.
customer_reviews.author: William VanZant

customer_reviews.title: other than that it's good. One
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple complaints, other than that it's good. One, the filers/sand paper sticks leave a lot of unwanted marks on the plastic of the gundam, no matter which color. Two, the part separator wears off and loses it's sharp edge after building 2 hg kits, but it wouldn't have if I didn't make any mistakes. Overall, great deal in my opinion, even if you're using it for things other than building models, these tools come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Father son project
customer_reviews.text: Just got my son interested in models, nice inexpensive kit to start off with
customer_reviews.author: william

customer_reviews.title: Good tools for a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: Good tools that do what you need them to. I'm not saying you won't ever upgrade, but anyone who says you can't get the job done with what's in this pack is full of shit. Everything in here works just fine.
customer_reviews.author: The Lightning Count

customer_reviews.title: Great tool set for beginners I used it recently to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great tool set for beginners I used it recently to build my first Gundam model and all the tools I would have imagined I would need are included and then some :) Get this one it surely wont disappoint.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio

customer_reviews.title: For the price this is a really good kit for models
customer_reviews.text: For the price this is a really good kit for models. I am using it for gunpla and it has everything I need and the items inside are good quality for beginners and advanced model builders too. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my dad after getting the piece one for myself a few months back to build gundams with. He loves it. It was like a kid on christmas watching him go through it. All the products seem pretty nice too and it's a good price so I highly suggest it to people.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: This is my first and only gunpla tool set. It has had everything I need. Tools seem to be of good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Dylan Meadows

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by the quality of this kit. The sprue cutters line up well, the tweezers are perfect, the files are good. The weakest is probably the hobby knife. Not a bad kit at all
customer_reviews.author: ctreader

customer_reviews.title: Perfect starter pack!
customer_reviews.text: I just started messing around with Gunpla kits and this has everything you need before you move on to more expensive tools. I would highly recommend this item if you're looking for something inexpensive and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: McKenna

customer_reviews.title: Value.
customer_reviews.text: Great value tool set for any beginner doing toy models.
customer_reviews.author: George T

customer_reviews.title: This is a really good kit. The hobby clippers have been great using ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really good kit. The hobby clippers have been great using on my Strike Freedom Gundam, Gouf and Gelgoog. I can't wait to keep using them in the future.
customer_reviews.author: R Stallbaum

customer_reviews.title: Great kit gives you every thing you need to start ...
customer_reviews.text: Great kit gives you every thing you need to start to build models with. The only other thing I could see you need to start to build Gundam kits would be some type of glue to hold some of the pieces together that wont stay. Also, you might want to look for paint or paint pens to take your model to the next level.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... a beginner with model kits and i am so glad I bought this
customer_reviews.text: I'm a beginner with model kits and i am so glad I bought this. It has everything I needed when I built my first kit except for a cutting mat and some glue, but you don't necessarily need those anyways
customer_reviews.author: Mysti

customer_reviews.title: Everything you need
customer_reviews.text: Great product, clippers are sharp and all the tools work perfectly.100% recommended for building gundam models.
customer_reviews.author: Logan N

customer_reviews.title: This has everything you need!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great kit, literally a one stop shop for everything you need to handle almost any model. Works great for Gundam models too!
customer_reviews.author: Nick Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners
customer_reviews.text: My SO was starting to be very interested in Gundam model kits but hadn’t actually started building any yet, so I was looking to put together a starter kit of tools and a model kit as a Christmas present (I didn’t know much about model building either at the time). This set of tools was a great starting point.

customer_reviews.title: The tweezers are very useful for applying stickers and decals
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. The tweezers are very useful for applying stickers and decals. The sanding sticks are of great help, although they should really label them. The pen knife has been extremely useful.
customer_reviews.author: DismayLand10

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for great price

customer_reviews.title: Good assortment of tools
customer_reviews.text: Excellent kit for model enthusiasts. Sprue clippers cut very clean. Various files make it easy to smooth rough edges. All the included tools help the model have a cleaner, more polished look.

customer_reviews.title: Gr8 set
customer_reviews.text: Everything you need to build, I'd recommend also getting a couple of the pens so you can do some shading when you're done

customer_reviews.title: Great Kit for any level Model Builder

customer_reviews.title: I received these and for a majority of the tools ...

customer_reviews.title: Just the right amount of tools
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best purchases I have made. Every item included addresses any need you may encounter while building plastic kits.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Starter
customer_reviews.text: Definitely a starter kit, but the tools seem to be quality and exactly what you need. Can't beat the value.

customer_reviews.title: Very helpful little set that comes in a nice carrying case
customer_reviews.text: I have actually used every single one of the tools included in this pack, though I was initially skeptical I would need them all. Very helpful little set that comes in a nice carrying case.

customer_reviews.title: Great for gunpla

customer_reviews.text: The side cutters, tweezers, knife, and sanding sticks are the most useful parts in this kit and are frequently used in the gunpla building process.

customer_reviews.title: The filing sticks and carrying case are the biggest gain in getting this so I can store more of my tools in here like my hand held drill vice and small saws
customer_reviews.text: Using these on a new kitbash samurai Barbatos build in gundam. The filing sticks and carrying case are the biggest gain in getting this so I can store more of my tools in here like my hand held drill vice and small saws.

customer_reviews.title: Good set of modeling tools

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking kit but.....

customer_reviews.title: Great starter kit for beginners
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always wanted to do gunpla before and I never knew what tools I would need, and to be fair I’m just new to plastic models as a whole. I highly recommend this kit for beginners to plastic modeling

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my boyfriend, who likes to do models. He said this set has everything he needs, and was thrilled with the quality of the tools! Definitely a good buy!

customer_reviews.title: Not Top Of Line, But Great For Price
customer_reviews.text: Solid basics for a starter, good value for the amount of items you receive. It's Chinese equipment, so, yknow, I'm not sure about the long term reliability of the pieces, but as of now, they all seem to be exactly what I need and want, especially the pen cutter. Obviously a real X-acto and a pair of Godhand cutters would be more optimal, but the value of this kit is immense

customer_reviews.text: The plastic case that it came in was crushed and broken, but all the tools were okay and it looks like it will work well with my model.

customer_reviews.text: This is a must have for any Gundam or model kit builder. Got it super fast!

customer_reviews.title: Good buy lots of tools included in this kit
customer_reviews.text: A lot of great tools for model assembly. Or just great small tools for a tool box. I love it. Awesome buy.
customer_reviews.author: Yao L.

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: The kit has lots of tools, easy to use and good for those who start to play model kits
customer_reviews.author: Trent Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.text: These are all items I needed to start building Model Cars. I do recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Nesbit
